snippet: The vice-presidential debate on Thursday provoked heated discussion into the next day. Here are a look at two disputed claims.
abstract: Check Point column analyzes some of disputed claims made during vice-presidential debate.

byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and SHERYL GAY STOLBERG

lead_paragraph: The vice-presidential debate on Thursday provoked heated discussion into the next day. Here are a look at two disputed claims.
